Okporo ụzọ Ikorodu bụ nnukwu ụzọ awara awa jikọtara Mainland nke Lagos na Ikorodu
A na-ahọpụta ụzọ ahụ dị ka okporo ụzọ awara awa A1 maka ogologo ya niile dị kilomita 24.5
Maka ọtụtụ n'ime akụkụ Lagos, ọ bụ ụzọ awara awara anọ nwere ụzọ abụọ dị n'ihu n'akụkụ ụzọ awara awara
Okporo ụzọ awara awara gafere okporo ụzọ awara awara ndị ọzọ dị ka Apapa Oworonshoki Expressway na Lagos-Ibadan Expressway
Okporo ụzọ awara awara na-enwekwa ọtụtụ n'ime ụgbọ ala na-agba ọsọ nke Lagos Metropolitan Area Transport Authority (BRT) na-akwụsị ruo Ikorodu
Okporo ụzọ Ikorodu na-amalite n'ụzọ iwu mgbe ọ gafere na Murtala Muhammed Way na Lagos Mainland
Site n'ebe a, ọ na-aga n'ebe ugwu na-ekewa Mushin na Somolu
Mgbe akara kilomita anọ ya gasịrị, okporo ụzọ awara awara na-agbanwere na Apapa Oworonshoki Expressway ma ọ bụ Gbagada Expressway
Mgbe ọ gafere mgbanwe ahụ, ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ebe ugwu gaa Mobolaji Bank Anthony Way (na-eduga na Computer Village na Murtala Muhammed International Airport)
Mgbe ahụ, ọ na-eme mgbanwe cloverleaf na Lagos-Ibadan Expressway
Mgbe mgbanwe a gasịrị, ọ na-aghọ ụzọ akwara kewara ekewa n'ụzọ ọwụwa anyanwụ niile n'ime Ikorodu.
